title: Operations Executive
subtitle: 10 Minute School
description: I was part of the Project X Smartbook team. Joining as an intern, I demonstrated unparalleled excellence, earning the title of Intern of the Month. Later as the team lead, I overhauled the team's workflow, conducted training sessions on Front-end Development that resulted in significant increase in quality and efficieny and also acted.

title: Marketing Director
subtitle: Prism Advertising | University of Calgary
description: After getting admitted to the Computer Science program at University of Calgary, I felt it necessary to expand my network into the business side of the campus. I joined the marketing club, PrismA where I designed digital content for dozens of clubs, non-profits and businesses and grew my network.

title: Software Developer - Intern
subtitle: TC Energy
description: From the beginning of my undergrad life, I knew I had to get an internship to standout in the field of Software Development and I made that my mission. I got an offer on the very first interview I was invited to and I started my 16-month intership at one of the largest corporations in North America where I honed my skills in Cloud Computing
